contentList.content: A case intricately carved from ancient yew, perfect for keeping scrolls free from coffee spills and dragon fire.
A charming little pouch enchanted to chill your potions. Remember, a cool potion is a happy potion!
A golden case with pockets for each piece, ensuring your jewels don't jangle at inopportune moments.
Crafted from the finest leather, this bag ensures your armor doesn't pick up any... unwanted scents during long journeys. Orcs don't have noses, but Shadowheart does!
A robust bag made from gnome-woven fabric. Keeps your boots paired, because everyone knows a lone boot is a sad boot.
Tailored from shadowy silk, this bag will hide your cloaks from any prying eyes, especially those nosy halflings next door.
Ever found yourself misplacing a glove? Fret no more with this glove-specific bag. Gloves for the right hand on the right and... well, you get the idea.
A bag fit for helms of all sizes, except maybe that one gigantic one you got from the giant ogre. Good luck with that.
Reinforced with dwarf steel, this bag ensures your shields stay pristine. Dents from dragon bites not covered.
Crafted with battle in mind, this bag has compartments for swords, daggers, and even that awkward trident you don't like talking about.
That's a lot of bags... and, oh my, they're all labelled!
Specially crafted quiver with anti-rattle enchantment, because nothing gives away your hiding spot like the jingle-jangle of arrows.
An enchanted bookshelf in compact form. Each tome has a designated spot, and there's a sneaky compartment for your diary.
A bundle enchanted by fey tailors. Clothes remain wrinkle-free and leave smelling faintly of lilac and gooseberries.
A versatile sack for all those little items you can't bear to part with. Ever wondered where that single earring or shiny pebble went? Check here.
A satchel lined with shock-absorbent material, ensuring your grenades stay intact until you're ready for that boom! Perfect for the discerning alchemist on the go.
A mystical box with a locking charm. Within its confines, your treasured mementos are protected from time's eroding touch.
A holder intricately designed with an anti-spill mechanism. Each vial is held securely, ensuring you're the one doing the poisoning, not getting poisoned!
